svg:
<path d="M90 0V 190 H 690" fill="none" stroke="<%= BASE-OUTLINE-COLOR %>" stroke-width="5" />
<path d="M 90 44 H 685" fill="none" stroke="<%= HARD-DASH-ARRAY-COLOR %>" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="10, 5" /> <path d="M 90 88 H 685" fill="none" stroke="<%= SOFT-DASH-ARRAY-COLOR %>" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="5, 8" /> <path d="M 90 132 H 685" fill="none" stroke="<%= HARD-DASH-ARRAY-COLOR %>" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="10, 5" /> <path d="M 90 152 H 685" fill="none" stroke="<%= SOFT-DASH-ARRAY-COLOR %>" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="5, 8" />
<%= CHART_FULL_GRAPH %> <%= CHART_HALF_GRAPH%>
<%= CHART_RECORD_HITS %> <%= COMMIT-TYPE %>
